gw.api.graph

Class BasicGraph<T extends java.lang.Object>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.graph.BasicGraph<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Graph<T>

    public class BasicGraph<T extends java.lang.Object>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Graph<T>
    Basic implementation of a directed graph.
